fields.description:
{html}

Another LH ticket filed for Android here: https://appcelerator.lighthouseapp.com/projects/32238-titanium-mobi...

Feature request by customer to allow for both Android and iOS modules at the same time. The work around is easy enough currently.

HD Ticket for reference: http://developer.appcelerator.com/helpdesk/view/65931

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: Support for side by side modules
